sent.orig: Results: Gene medication, gene diagnosis and gene therapy were clinical used.
sent.trans: 结果基因药物，基因诊断和治疗已在临床上取得一定应用。

sent.orig: Combined with the human tyrosinase gene sequence, the gene tree was constructed using parsimony method.
sent.trans: 结合已发表人的序列，用简约法构建了基因树。

sent.orig: They found that mice without the GRPR gene scratched less than normal mice with the gene.
sent.trans: 他们发现缺少GRPR基因的老鼠比正常带GRPR的老鼠挠抓的次数要少很多。

sent.orig: The bcr-abl fusion gene is the characteristic gene of chronic myeloid leukemia (CML).
sent.trans: 慢性粒细胞白血病(Chronic myeloid leukemia,CML)具有特征性的bcr-abl融合基因。

sent.orig: The affinity of T Ag to U2 gene is greater than that to Ul gene.
sent.trans: SV40 T抗原与U_2基因的亲和力大于U_1基因。
